song_lyrics: Hari-Akshar, haḷvā fūl, ame sau bhārī re,
Trājvaḍe besīne saune tole chhe avatārī re...
Sukhnu pallu sahej name tyā, dukhnī āve bhartī re,
Sthir rahe chhe ghaṭikā kintu, reṭ samaynī sartī re,
Sukh dukh pār batāve chhe e, ānand ras algārī re... 1
Nānu sarvar āshānu ghanghor hatāshā sāgar re,
Sang karāve Avināshīno sant pragaṭ sacharāchar re,
Aksharno sangāth maḷe to Dhām na lāge chheṭu re,
Jhaḷhaḷ-jhaḷhaḷ sakal palak jyā aḍkī gaī chingārī re... 2
title: Hari-Akshar haḷvā fūl ame sau bhārī re

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-197: Harindrabhai Dave

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
